email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $49.75 per ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any additional terms? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $50.00 per ton, which is competitive given the current market. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, built in 2018, and fully compliant with all regulations. Let me know if this works. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per ton is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star. Can you confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The laycan remains 15-20 October. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send the draft charter party shortly. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. The demurrage terms are acceptable. I’ll review the charter party and get back to you by end of day. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, just following up to confirm if you’ve had a chance to review the charter party. Let me know if there are any questions or changes needed. Best, Sarah
